We set the stage, bringing some of the best of the best entrepreneurs, marketers, best selling authors, event planners, event producers and industry leaders to The Event Planner Expo - year of year. 

We can’t wait to share what we have in store for you in 2024.  Grab your seat and reserve your ticket before prices increase 🙌

Tickets available at: TheEventPlannerExpo.com

2: We absolutely love hearing what our speakers have to say at their experience at the Expo.  Thank you Michelle Farber, Owner of MStudio Events for joining us as an attendee but also as a speaker to share your knowledge about event planning and producing unbelievable events.

The Event Planner Expo brings the best of the best together for 3 Days, 5 Days - unlimited networking opportunities, relationship building, inspiration, education and unforgettable experiences. 

This year’s Expo is taking place October 15th - 17th (Tuesday - Thursday) so mark your calendar and save the date for this unbelievable industry event.
